title: Is Ranked Even About Skill Anymore???
body:
Why is the game already decided over based on pick and bans
Why do I lose LP for getting an Alistar that dc's 3 times and then decides to not come back.
Why do I get demoted for having a Taric repeatedly tell us his update came out, get in game and then he buys ruby crystal and no potion with the summoner spells teleport and heal on support.
And how the hell do you expect me to NOT get mad when this happens and the enemies have a premade to top it all off.
